name: Decisions (Badjano Entertainment)
description:
R - Restart

ARROWS or SWIPE - Move

Puzzle where you control multiple players with same input, you have to finish the level even though there can be only one in the end.

I didn’t have much time to put into the making of this game, but I encourage you to follow me on itch.io to play it post mortem because it will be updated with more stuff as soon as I have more time!
